recipe.title: Callums Chilli
recipe.step: Heat oil in large pot and cook garlic for a few minutes. Add spices and cook for another minute or two. Add sweet potatoes and stir to coat. Add chopped tomatoes and cook until sweet potatoes cooked, but not mushy (about 10-20 minutes.) Rinse and drain all cans and add to pot. Add salt and pepper if using. Taste and add additional spices if necessary. Serve with any or all of grated cheese, guacamole, salsa, sour cream, chopped peppers, grated carrots, shredded lettuce, corn chips and flat bread.
